select au_num, au_endTime, max(au_bidPrice) as au_bidPrice, au_sellerId, au_pic, au_title from auction where au_status = 0 and au_title like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') group by au_num order by au_num desc
select au_num, au_endTime, max(au_bidPrice) as au_bidPrice, au_sellerId, au_pic, au_title, au_status from auction group by au_num having au_status = 0 order by count(au_num) desc;
